entry.title: Standing on the shoulders of giants, securely.
entry.summary:

entry.content:
Description

What is the software supply chain, why is it important, and how to manage it securely? Justin Womersley, of PyUp.io, will explore the topic of the Python software supply chain, how to configure it, how to keep it secure, and what the future may look like for responsibly standing on the shoulders of the giant that is the open-source software stack.

#PWC2022 attracted nearly 375 attendees from 36 countries and 21 time zones making it the biggest and best year yet. The highly engaging format featured 90 speakers, 6 tracks (including 80 talks and 4 tutorials) and took place virtually on March 21-25, 2022 on LoudSwarm by Six Feet Up.

More information about the conference can be found at: https://2022.pythonwebconf.com
